entries.name: new(markup = nil)
entries.desc: Creates a new formatter that will output Markdown format text

entries.name: accept_list_item_start(list_item)
entries.desc: Prepares the visitor for consuming list_item

entries.name: accept_list_start(list)
entries.desc: Prepares the visitor for consuming list

entries.name: gen_url(url, text)
entries.desc: Creates a Markdown-style URL from url with text.

entries.name: handle_rdoc_link(url)
entries.desc: Handles rdoc- type links for footnotes.

entries.name: handle_regexp_HARD_BREAK(target)
entries.desc: Adds a newline to the output

entries.name: handle_regexp_RDOCLINK(target)
entries.desc: Converts the rdoc-…: links into a Markdown.style links.

entries.name: handle_regexp_TIDYLINK(target)
entries.desc: Converts the RDoc markup tidylink into a Markdown.style link.
